devdoc.details: Time-locks tokens according to an unlock schedule.

claim(address,uint256).details: Claims the caller's tokens that have been unlocked, sending them to `recipient`.

params.amount: The amount to transfer. If greater than the claimable amount, the maximum is transferred.
params.recipient: The account to transfer unlocked tokens to.

claimableBalance(address).details: Returns the maximum number of tokens currently claimable by `owner`.

params.owner: The account to check the claimable balance of.

returns._0: The number of tokens currently claimable.

params._token: The token this contract will lock.l
params._unlockBegin: The time at which unlocking of tokens will be gin.
params._unlockCliff: The first time at which tokens are claimable.
params._unlockEnd: The time at which the last token will unlock.

lock(address,uint256).details: Transfers tokens from the caller to the token lock contract and locks them for benefit of `recipient`.      Requires that the caller has authorised this contract with the token contract.

params.amount: The number of tokens to transfer and lock.
params.recipient: The account the tokens will be claimable by.
